mapper.sql: t.id, t.dau, t.recharge_amount, t.recharge_count, t.new_users, t.user_count, t.betting_count, t.betting_amount, t.result_amount, t.result_rate, t.betting_rate, t.dau_pay_rate, t.betting_pay_rate, t.user_betting_rate, t.pay_arpu, t.pay_arppu, t.channel_name, t.parent_id, t.channel_id, t.business_date, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_flag
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dataware_final_channel_info_all t WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT FROM dataware_final_channel_info_all t WHERE ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dataware_final_channel_info_all t WHERE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dataware_final_channel_info_all ( id, dau, recharge_amount, recharge_count, new_users, user_count, betting_count, betting_amount, result_amount, result_rate, betting_rate, dau_pay_rate, betting_pay_rate, user_betting_rate, pay_arpu, pay_arppu, channel_name, parent_id, channel_id, business_date, create_time, delete_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dau}, #{rechargeAmount}, #{rechargeCount}, #{newUsers}, #{userCount}, #{bettingCount}, #{bettingAmount}, #{resultAmount}, #{resultRate}, #{bettingRate}, #{dauPayRate}, #{bettingPayRate}, #{userBettingRate}, #{payArpu}, #{payArppu}, #{channelName}, #{parentId}, #{channelId}, #{businessDate}, #{createTime}, #{deleteFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dataware_final_channel_info_all SET dau = #{dau}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount}, recharge_count = #{rechargeCount}, new_users = #{newUsers}, user_count = #{userCount}, betting_count = #{bettingCount}, betting_amount = #{bettingAmount}, result_amount = #{resultAmount}, result_rate = #{resultRate}, betting_rate = #{bettingRate}, dau_pay_rate = #{dauPayRate}, betting_pay_rate = #{bettingPayRate}, user_betting_rate = #{userBettingRate}, pay_arpu = #{payArpu}, pay_arppu = #{payArppu}, channel_name = #{channelName}, parent_id = #{parentId}, channel_id = #{channelId}, business_date = #{businessDate}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE dataware_final_channel_info_all SET delete_flag = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
